short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Advise Only Share Button is an awesome Advise Only client extension for Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the easiest way to share links on Advise Only right from your web browser. 
Simply click the button, and a pop-up opens with a share box pre-populated with the URL you were at and the page's title.
